snippet.title: Captain of Industry - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Get in on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1594320/Captain_of_Industry/?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=game_trailer
Website: https://www.captain-of-industry.com/
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/JxmUbGsNRU
Subreddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/captain_of_industry/

Captain of Industry is a colony and factory simulation game for PC.

With your ship and your crew, create cities and factories on an abandoned island. Move the earth using heavy machinery and research your way to your very own space program!

Released in Early Access on May 31st, 2022.
